Reviews.Title: “Great!”
Reviews.Author: SaraSukor Posted by an Easytobook.com traveler
Reviews.Content: unfortunately tone stay set moment arrival steps luggage 11 oclock night whilst doorman stood spot hands pockets grateful though drop comfortable bed wasnt following morning fully room husband hotel reception 3 months advance visit saying made reservation booking 5 nights december 2009 super europe offer stay celebrate special anniversary please could arrange good twin room wife first visit madrid much looking forward stay hotel visiting exciting city thank much help however think allocated must smallest twin room whole hotel yes realise going sleep room besides size also need refurbishment certainly standard hotels current 4star rating room experienced wallpaper dirty 4 x 3 ceiling walking point refrigerator end bed heavy security type door without closer pulled room doors along corridor hotels really saving fact position central near lot major sights knew booked fact reason chose madrid sol melia hotels available plus nice public rooms one really good thing one best recommendations room attendant kept room spotless standard room booked feel given

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: designsbykari
Reviews.Content: husband stayed hotel three nights excellent time madrid thanks stay tryp ambassador hotel room large quiet corner hotel breakfast morning delicious everything nice clean staff friendly correct helpful

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel outside the city area”
Reviews.Author: loveducks
Reviews.Content: four star hotel great location quiet street access subway lines one block away huge room great ac fine bathroom eat hotel thought prices bit high internet access could purchase use time three day period using time one sitting front desk gave great recommendation restaurant near us opera special deals hotel chain sol got three days price two days booked week advance

Reviews.Title: “Decent”
Reviews.Author: dmowatt
Reviews.Content: hotel lost elegance still sort faded charm firstly staff friendly helpful location good culture shopping rooms small usual facilities breakfast good fresh less fruit would made difference didnt try restaurant cant comment real problem noise couple mornings honest trying sleep late good rate made excellent value would recommend hotel anyway staff location general feeling yes could upgrade risk character

Reviews.Title: “Surprised!”
Reviews.Author: bricketts
Reviews.Content: strange hotel main positives size rooms upgrade staff friendly however would expect soundproofing recommended quit people keen interest neighbours tv choices heat rooms amenities find madrid third price great traditional madrid many saw two designer hotels around corner would check ever area

Reviews.Title: “I would not give more than 2 stars!”
Reviews.Author: UmutAYildiz
Reviews.Content: wonderful time hotel read left little apprehensive however husband stayed six nights april found courteous helpful paid 20 euros day extra upgraded room money spent well worth room spacious also enjoyed buffet breakfast found food good quality would definitely recommend property

Reviews.Title: “Average hotel that's too far away”
Reviews.Author: Grahamc84
Reviews.Content: returned long weekend staying tryp ambassador werent originally booked hotel placed previous hotel overbooked apprehensive reading reviews website really pleased hotel it’s 2 min walk tube station dont take taxi cost 35 euros better spent towards meal tube cost us 2 euros easy hotel centre madrid side street quiet traffic noise 2 min walk opera 5 min walk palace overall centre everything hotel grand yes old yes carpets little bare perhaps could make look around it’s bad pleasantly surprised size rooms rooms clean nicely decorated cleaned every day ok bathroom suite orange clean air conditioning little noisy enough keep awake night show air conditioning units staffs friendly speak good english happy recommend restaurants would stay hotel certainly yes

Reviews.Content: checked immediately post review checkin clerk named rude asked enter passport information computer said started way spain dealing 30 years know history said dealing isnt something new americans tired wanted get need didnt think place give

Reviews.Title: “Inexpensive, far from the metro, the hotel needs renovation”
Reviews.Author: ussmax
Reviews.Content: bit hotel negative reviews great liked hotel others stayed spain upgraded reservation junior suite good decision suite balcony big enough ten people suite spacious clean attractive hotel ive stayed us staff extremely helpful responsive needs hotel madrid wonderful hotel located near almost everything wanted see used cab go restaurant hotel able secure reservation reservations restaurant often difficult short notice

Reviews.Title: “Clean and quiet hotel. Location...not so good.”
Reviews.Author: StarBrigt7
Reviews.Content: stayed tryp ambassador 2 nights august excellent location 100 yards santa metro stop 2 line 300 yards opera metro stop also 2 line walk opera palace park sol plaza gran via many places nice fairly simple lobby nice small bar charming restaurant atrium setting desk staff helpful internet connection lobby 3 euros 1 hour room fake hardwood floor cable tv nicely appointed bathroom modern amenities best part paid approx two nights hotwire incredible deal

Reviews.Title: “Quiet Hotel in Quiet Location.”
Reviews.Author: aaSilverFox
Reviews.Content: booked four night stay hotwire paid 75 usd night originally booked hostel price decided give four star offer hotwire chance glad hotel clean room spacious location excellent royal palace royal theatre short walk charming old town bath nice big tub even large window one three four entire room facing tight main drawback noisy aircon efficient though breakfast included paid one morning definitly four star maybe included price

Reviews.Title: “Haha, 4 star? No way”
Reviews.Author: GaborLondon
Reviews.Content: nice hotel big rooms nice interior great lot noise corridor noisy air conditioning room bathroom need renovation

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value!”
Reviews.Author: LucasLondon_UK
Reviews.Content: bellman help luggage staff stands around struggle bags room service pool parking pay go couple blocks away walls paper thin hear watching tv ac unit goes feels like landing bed never tired sleeping hotel room guy front desk says concierge could recommend good local internet room staff problem great location dont plan sleeping good bet wouldnt recommend hotel worst

Reviews.Title: “Good Place To Stay for a budget”
Reviews.Author: worldtravellers123
Reviews.Content: enjoyed stay hotel large room great air conditioner nice bathroom exception one clerk reception desk hotel employees helpful rate included breakfast buffet offered lots choices food good hotel outstanding went great help left taxi arrived hotel flight hotel manager sent beautiful basket fruit room next day visit got rough start course rough start result especially nice gesture

Reviews.Title: “Not recommended”
Reviews.Author: cw1706
Reviews.Content: returned stay hotel booked work work trip read reviews looking forward stay pleasantly surprised room good size although bed pillow pretty uncomfortable breakfast good good variety hotel situated former palace older feel youre used staying modern hotels probably appeal one definite downside leisure facilities location hotel fantastic 5minute walk plaza del lovely bars restaurants whole staff friendly although rather surly woman duty whilst others friendly happy least trying speak little spanish hotel little dated probably could bit upgrade whole nearly bad reviews suggested first time feel ive tripadvisor reviews

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel. Nice staff. Excellent breakfast. OK if you like walking.”
Reviews.Author: MalWales
Reviews.Content: recent reviewer noted hotel young stylish hotel likely described w even describe overall generally positive experience planning stay 6 nights opted reserve superior room thinking would give space nice view first room gave spacious bizarre shape one window facing small light well second room also spacious also oddly tiny room large bed large living space balcony would little use cold month january im usually picky rooms short stay asked room facing street got slightly smaller brighter room facing street last room unfortunately typical two small beds pressed faced street better light note reserve call hotel ask exactly type room want see reserve specific room number room good shape clearly recent upgrade major renovation done early judging date posted elevators floors rooms saw furniture dark hardwood floors desk set business person outlets nearby laptop cell phone additionally hotel wifi rooms wifi connection worked sitting one corner room facing corner wifi important room near one wifi base stations minibar looked place relatively typically priced items theres little store street cheap water snacks etc ask front desk room service quick friendly unfortunately hot dishes usually warm delivery food restaurant generally good great breakfast buffet staff around helpful friendly english language varied person person doors rooms like heavy doors bank lock inside keep housekeeping staff heavy door heavy locks anyone outside could open definitely use disturb signs described hotel recently renovated unfortunately renovation bathroom bathrooms three rooms saw small weird fixtures including bidet shower wouldnt hold position drop ceiling stained worst part rooms neighborhood construction opted move different hotel last days hoping get room real internet access better summary nice staff quirky decent accomodations good hotel business trip

Reviews.Title: “Not outstanding, but very decent”
Reviews.Author: aprilwitch
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights hotel business tryp husband hotel staff nice helpful breakfast buffet nice central prices minibar ok hotel old palace modern design hotel liked

Reviews.Title: “Not bad”
Reviews.Author: PAJK
Reviews.Content: major construction room unable use safe promised us every morning new safe would never showed 4 days stayed didnt seem decor staff would expect 4star say would stay simply location

Reviews.Title: “Worst Hotel Ever”
Reviews.Author: MiaQueensland
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 4 nights august 10th twin room paid 56 night bargain hotel well located short walk gran via royal palace puerta del sol plaza mayor etc would say hotel used grand indeed little edges huge room wooden floor nice shutters keep morning sun bay efficient freindly front desk staff prepared orange bathroom suite taste get great deal hotel

Reviews.Title: “Very convenient for reaching Parc Guell, quite and reserved”
Reviews.Author: bazza78
Reviews.Content: hotel trip ambassador madrid date may 2006 returned spain stayed 4 nights large hotel old center madrid 50 metro everything within street relation location rather quiet much traffic breakfast wonderfull everything wanted good service rooms large good beds bathroom little bit worn disappointing airconditioning action asked airconditioning started may time madrid already 30 degrees room hot 4 hotels stayed trip still working airconditioning rooms may cannot recommend trip ambassador hotel madrid

Reviews.Title: “Loved it”
Reviews.Author: florida3122
Reviews.Content: stayed two weeks first large comfortable front room lights side chairs breakfast table street noise across street switched us peaceful somewhat smaller back room without couch coffee table garden great service staff fixed minor problems quickly room service breakfast ten minutes theres also enormous buffet downstairs great location metro nice little english book store around corner greatest find nightly 6 pm restaurant one block away hotel next opera called la food lovely best salmon ever ate rare steak large green salads meant wait restaurants open 830

Reviews.Title: “I loved it and so did my friends and teachers”
Reviews.Author: guapachica
Reviews.Content: hotel good hotel middle action madrid decor rooms bit sparse rooms clean youre looking go somewhere else spend little lot great hotel looking comfortable place good location

Reviews.Title: “Horror and nightmare come true”
Reviews.Author: aclassen
Reviews.Content: hotel clean centrally located walls floors every adjacent rooms basically hear conversations running water door neighbors keep mind stay late normally would really bother stayed night flying back us keep least sunday would recommend need good nights rest

Reviews.Title: “OK apart from the Giant Cockroaches”
Reviews.Author: Xlapak
Reviews.Content: husband stayed hotel past august 5 nights booked web site got great rate 65 euro night room got huge staff helpful hotel use updating nice european decor amenities would want internet access small fee breakfast buffet nice delicious got discounted rate breakfast well euro otherwise double price hotel walking distance royal palace plaza del sol recommend hotel especially get good rate hotel chain web site like

Reviews.Title: “No words to discribe how HORRIBLE it was”
Reviews.Author: Nussyhk
Reviews.Content: really enjoyed stay hotel excellent location near many good sites lots good room really exceeded expectations also quiet main concern madrid stayed sol melia hotels throughout time spain part happy experiences

Reviews.Title: “Terrible Experience”
Reviews.Author: MoshiachNow
Reviews.Content: beautiful comfortable hotel great location near two metro stops got internet particularly good deal female reception staff hotel exceptional helped questions directions sending package back us even giving us use setting massage girlfriend would think twice getting breakfast believe cost good breakfast thats lot money spain anyway highly recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Don't bother!”
Reviews.Author: sandabbi
Reviews.Content: stayed october excellent location within walking distance many attractions restaurants shopping room quiet faced interior courtyard though room little stuffy warm check sol melia web site good weekend rates

Reviews.Title: “Never 4 star”
Reviews.Author: romeodunn
Reviews.Content: stayed easter sunday weekend price offered lower hostels barcelona liked quiet area away touristy areas even gaudi park 20 minute walk away close enough get 35 stops away metro direction given hotel website metro ended walking around bit looking hotel name street map metro room 2 huge single beds flat screen tv english channels

Reviews.Title: “Disappointing”
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel three nights tour group room 6th floor great view city location okay access metro easily get tourist sites could dropped front hotel due narrow roads haul luggage hill main road meals served group buffet style lot good choices bathroom little dated could use repair overall room comfortable lobby beautiful space lots room sit relax
